text: Arau ami sihamtaka dbinara yaratiya bisayata suspasta pramanadi dana karaichilo. Tathapi'o sihamtara ocarata jnana ahara pichato sihamte kerala paraspara bidbesabasata mata biraodha karaichila. Sihamte yibora bisayata matabiraodha karaichila, niscaya tomara pratipalake kiyamatara dina sihamtara majata se'ibora bisayara phayacala karai diba
